articles.title: England reports case of rare monkeypox infection, World News - AsiaOne
articles.description: LONDON - A person in England has been diagnosed with a rare viral monkeypox infection thought to be linked to travel to West Africa, health authorities said on Saturday (May 7). The UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA) said in a statement the case, in a person w…

articles.title: Fred Savage dropped from The Wonder Years reboot amid allegations of inappropriate conduct - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: As a child star, Savage appeared in the original series, which ran from 1988 to 1993.
articles.content: Fred Savage has been dropped as an executive producer and director of the rebooted The Wonder Years amid allegations of inappropriate conduct, the television show's production company has confirmed.… [+830 chars]
